cta_whatsapp_message: Hello, I am interested in Chevalia Estate. Please contact me.
project_info_title: Grand Villas at Chevalia Estate Dubai
project_info_text: Rising above the ordinary, Chevalia Estate offers architectural marvels with equestrian grace, inviting you to dwell in refined luxury. These villas blend contemporary elegance with serene landscapes, creating a harmonious escape for family living and sophisticated entertaining in the vibrant setting of the Grand Polo Club.
amenities_title: Amenities and spaces designed for refined living
project_summary_title: Tranquil Living near Grand Polo Club
project_summary_subtitle: Elegant Design Inspired by Equestrian Grace
map_text: Adjacent to the prestigious Grand Polo Club and Resort, Chevalia Estate offers a sophisticated lifestyle imbued with the tranquility of nature and the elegance of equestrian pursuits. Here, amid the dynamic tapestry of Dubai Investment Park, you'll experience a refined sanctuary, where elegantly designed villas complement the serene, verdant surroundings.
footer_tagline: Ultra-luxury villas near Grand Polo Club
